Text:
Sorry all for my stupid question, but could some one tell me how to turn this thing into a DVD set again, or otherwise be able to play it with English language?
Thx
It allready is DVD. If you wanna burn it just google how to burn DVD from folder.

Be aware that this torrent comes in English and Deutch.  No dutch language or subtitle at all. I just downloaded and check the disk properly. Thanks

btw, if you want to burn it, just dowload and install Imgburn. Use the option "build"  and add the video_ts folder in it. Suc6

Ik heb de dvd gebrand met Imgburn. Krijg enkel engels en duits als voertaal. Er is geen subtitle te vinden op de gebrande dvd. Doe ik wat verkeert? Hoe krijgen jullie NL sub's? Wat houd dit in: Postinfo Subs : NL extern ???
(geen beginneling, maar weet ook niet alles ;-)
good job guys, it works just great. thanks.
